Хорошая головоломка!

Portal 2 es un juego de puzzles en primera persona, y como su precuela, nos valdremos de la famosa portal-gun para resolverlos.

Este juego mejora por completo todos los aspectos de Portal: 

HISTORIA

Una historia mucho más elaborada, con nuevos personajes interesantes como Wheatley, Cave Johnson, Caroline... 
Profundizas en la historia de Aperture y en sus inicios como empresa, al igual que obtienes más información de los orígenes de GLaDOS. 

Y muchos más toques de humor (sobretodo sarcásticos), que siempre es de agradecer.


JUGABILIDAD

Puzzles mejor dieseñados con nuevas mecánicas (como los láseres termales disuasorios, las pasarelas de luz sólida, los tres tipos de geles y los embudos de translación), y obviamente manteniendo las antiguas mecánicas presentadas en Portal, pero todo mucho más complejo y difícil.


CAMPAÑA COOP

Después de haber probado esta campaña y habérmela pasado, tengo que decir que es muy buena y muy recomendable. Y tiene cierta gracia el ir superando prueba a prueba con un amigo, bastante satisfactorio. Y te enseña lo que en momentos desesperados es la amistad.


CONCLUSIÓN

Es un nuevo Portal, pero mejorado, 2.0. Tiene una duración más aceptable que la de su precuela, a mí me ha durado 7 horas y es de agradecer. Realmente me ha sorprendido para bien y me parece espectacular como empatizas con GLaDOS, la principal villana de esta saga. El final es una gozada, en cuanto a mecánicas no es muy original, pero el toque definitivo es demasiado bueno. Totalmente recomendado.

NOTA: 9/10

Très amusant,vous fera beaucoup réfléchir :)
Je recommande fortement le mode mutijoueur pour jouer avec des amis...enfin UN ami.
Car oui vous devrez bien choisir l'ami avec qui vous aller jouer et ceux que vous aller donc délaisser,car nous ne pouvons jouer q'a deux au mode multijoueur. :)))

Malgré ça,très bon jeu,encore un chef-d'oeuvre de Valve qui sait encore concevoir les scenarios et les timelines à la perfection.
A essayer.

Valve's masterpiece!
How often do you play a puzzle game in first person perspective? I think not often. Usually I don't like FPS but this game is so good and unique sometimes you just want to shoot portals to mess around with the superbly done physical interaction in the game.
The difficulty is just at a right level. Sometimes you may get stuck a bit but then you feel a sudden rush of creativity, you realize a combination of interaction, you try it out. And voila, it works! Such a great satisfaction you will feel.
Icing on the Cake (pun intended) is the intriguing story. The gameplay alone is enough to get you to play but motivating you to keep going is the talk from the AI, of which voice acting is top notch. I'm honestly curious about the Portal universe. What happened to the world? Cave Johnson? What about other test subjects?
Beside from single mode, you can even enjoy it with your friends in co-op mode.
All in all this game is a must have. What are you waiting for? Here's a lemon!

Portal 2 - одна из лучших игр от Valve.
Шедевральная игра, в которую стоит поиграть. Отличный геймплей, игра, сама по себе, не очень то и сложная, просто интересная головоломка, но вот бывают моменты, где нужна реакция/быстрота/точечный тайминг. Графика приятная, атмосферано, а уровни хорошо проработаны. Интересный и оригинальный сюжет, так же веселый кооп, который стоит пройти. 
Даже минусов и не нашел, 10/10

Рекомендую, для начало поиграть в перкую часть. Я вас прошу не играть во вторую часть этой игры, не играя в первую. Игра пробирает до настольгии в щитаные минуты.
С первых же минут мы оказываемся в нашей первой коюте. Затем немного старых головоломок, и вот мы уже в конце первой  части. Игра очень интересная!

This game is pretty good but it is not perfect.

Pros
- very challenging
- great controls (Its valve what do you expect)
- story is pretty good 
-graphics are ok but I wouldn't have fussed if they continued off with their old half life 2 style graphics

Cons
- It runs like shit on my computer. the average frame rate for me was most of the time 30 fps. Fucking the forest runs better and their graphics are way better then this games. (not that portal 2s graphics are bad). My PC is not a shitty computer either, I only just got it for Christmas last year and it cost over a thousand dollars.

This is a great game but it is not anywhere near as good as the likes of some of Valves older games like Half life 2 and even half life 1. Sorry to burst your bubble fanboys but this game is not legendary. It is still a great game.

Before you say that I have only played for an hour, thats all I need to understand how well a game runs. I dont give a care about the story.

Update: I have finished the game and I still stand by my claims

노잼이었다... 2만원이 아까웠던 작품.
이번에 2100원으로 할인하는걸 보니 생각나서 리뷰 남긴다.

일단 퍼즐 풀다가 어떻게 하는지 몰라서 막힐 때는 미칠 것 같더라.
특히 후반부에서는, 방법을 알더라도 순간 순간의 컨트롤과 포탈을 쏘는 각도도 필요한데 피지컬이 딸려서 못해먹겠더라.

결국 때려치우고 그냥 유튜브로 고수들이 몇분만에 엔딩 가는 영상을 보고 치웠다.
돈이 아까워서 끝까지 하려 했던 게임이었지만 유일하게 내가 플레이를 포기한 게임.
지금까지 살면서 게임 하다가 중도에 포기한 적이 한번도 없었는데 이건 정말 예외였다. 

이런 게임은 그냥 남이 하는거 보는게 최고인듯...
물론 취향에 맞는 사람은 즐겁게 할 수도.
내 인생에 퍼즐은 답이 아닌갑다.

때려 부수는 게임에서 가장 짜증나는 순간이 퍼즐 등장하는 경우
예) 어쌔신크리드 시리즈에서 자물쇠 따야 하는 순간 (이 단순한 퍼즐도 매우 짜증난다!)

Quite possibly the best game I've ever played. It is a sequel to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198121797462/recommended/400]Portal[/url], a successful remake of a DigiPen Institute game concept (thus, evolving from a student creation, and expanded by [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1808400/Tag_The_Power_of_Paint/]another such game[/url]) that's not only a remake, it's a AAA game of the highest standards. It continues the story of Portal, not however in the present, but the far future. Being so far into the future, Aperture Science Enrichment Center has become a wreck, and due to reserve power running out, the entire relaxation chamber malfunctions, waking up all test subjects, including yourself. You meet a new character, Wheatley, a Personality Core with a unique personality, who introduces you to the puzzle-solving adventure.

Without further spoiling the game, it doesn't stop surprising you. You really need to play it in order to understand. Just play the game. Especially if you have played Portal 1, if not I recommend you to play it too, but play Portal 2. Just do it.

Plus, the game includes even more challenges, a built-in level editor, has a [url=https://steamcommunity.com/app/620/workshop/]Workshop[/url] and [url=https://store.steampowered.com/mods/620/]incredible mods[/url] exist for it, so it never gets old and can be played indefinitely.
